Title: Metlili - MTL-2 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Celebrating the imperfections that are inherent in handwoven textiles, the Metlili collection abounds with character that is impossible to reproduce by other means. The charming MTL-2 area rug features a linear pattern that arches across each end, accented with a playful fringe to complete the look.

  • Lemieux Et Cie emphasizes the creative process in every design. Each item in their catalog is handmade in small batches by skilled artisans using premium quality materials for heirloom-quality appeal.
  • Natural neutrals make this southwest area rug easy to coordinate with a wide variety of interior palettes. This piece is a fantastic fit for mid-century, bohemian, and contemporary interior themes.
  • Each area rug in the Metlili collection is handwoven by skilled artisans. MTL-2 is a 100% wool area rug crafted with a reversible flatwoven construction for twice the wear and enjoyment.
  • Shedding is to be expected but this will subside with regular vacuuming. Vacuum using a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment as needed.

Title: Gurara - GUR-7 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Inspired by the work of Romanian sculptor Constantin Brancusi, the gorgeous GUR-7 area rug captures the eye with its evocative geometric shapes and its warm earthy palette. This attractive interior accent is part of the Gurara collection by Lemieux Et Cie – a collection of handcrafted interior accents made with heirloom-quality appeal in mind.

  • Founded by Christiane Lemieux, Lemieux Et Cie is an interior decor label that places creative processes at center stage. Each piece is made in small batches by skilled artisans.
  • This transitional rug features oversized geometric shapes rendered in comfortable black and white tones over a base of versatile beige. Use this flatwoven rug on its own or use as a layering element.
  • GUR-7 is a blended area rug made with a combination of jute, wool, and viscose fibers. This piece is flatwoven by skilled artisans, the edges tightly finished to prevent fraying in high traffic areas.
  • Vacuum using a suction-only setting as needed. Avoid prolonged contact with moisture. Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge.

Bold geometric shapes make the Gurara GUR-6 area rug an especially eye-catching design worth prominent placement in your most well-curated interior spaces. This exquisite accent is handcrafted by skilled Lemieux Et Cie artisans, each one made with the care and attention of a future heirloom.

  • Artisanal construction defines the Lemieux Et Cie brand. Each piece is handcrafted in small batches, with process given the same level of importance as the finished product.
  • Each transitional rug in the Gurara collection is inspired by the work of iconic Romanian sculptor Constantin Brancusi. This piece keeps things fittingly simple with angular shapes in black and white over an earthy beige base.
  • Jute, wool, and viscose are interwoven to create this blended area rug composition, satisfying in texture and tonality. Each one is handwoven by skilled artisans for long-lasting appeal. All edges are tightly finished to prevent fraying.
  • Prevent prolonged contact with moisture by blotting spills immediately using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Invest in professional cleaning as needed.

Title: Duar - DUA-4 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Impeccable handcrafted construction elevates every detail of the DUA-4 area rug by Lemieux Et Cie. This handsome interior accent is part of the Duar collection, a series that borrows from diverse global influences like Japanese shibori, Scandinavian rollakans, southwestern sarapes, and more.

  • Designer and entrepreneur Christiane Lemieux launched the Lemieux Et Cie brand with an eye trained on the creative process – each design is produced in small batches, handmade by a global network of artisans who are masters of their crafts.
  • Elegant southwestern rug motifs beat rhythmic patterns around the edges of this eye-catching design. Choose between two colorways to best suit your interior decor theme. Use to complement interior themes like rustic, bohemian, mid-century, and more.
  • Handwoven construction ensures that each Duar collection accent is imbued with individual charm and character. This is a 100% wool rug handwoven by skilled artisans, the body flatwoven and the edges finished in a short fringe.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills immediately upon noticing. Vacuum using a suction-only setting. Professional cleaning is recommended.

Quality leather remnants leftover from garment producers have been repurposed to create the beautiful Tezah collection from Lemieux Et Cie. The handsome TEZ-3 area rug features a flat textural base woven with Moroccan-inspired patterns for a creative boho-chic aesthetic.

  • Luxury interior accessory brand Lemieux Et Cie was created with an emphasis on quality craftsmanship, every item produced in small batches by a global network of master artisans.
  • Cool grey leather strips give the surface of this contemporary area rug a variegated palette that opens the door for a world of coordination possibilities. Larger loops create the geometric patterns that play across the top.
  • Skilled artisans weave every Tezah rug entirely by hand. These leather rugs are woven from reclaimed garment industry remnants and bound by resilient cotton threads. Both ends are finished to prevent fraying.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills immediately upon noticing. Avoid prolonged contact with moisture. Rotate annually.

Title: Argan - ARG-7 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Inspired by the intricate geometric patterns used throughout African mud cloth textiles, the Argan collection by Lemieux Et Cie captures the eye with rhythmic repetition and thoughtful asymmetries. The handsome ARG-7 area rug is an especially colorful addition to the collection with expressive patterns rendered in light beiges over a striking blue base.

  • Handcrafted construction stands at the heart of the Lemieux Et Cie brand. Each area rug in the Argan collection is handwoven in small batches, each artisan imbuing the rugs with their own unique touch.
  • This contemporary area rug features a linear motif that alternates between chevrons, diamonds, and circular details. Each line is rendered in thick yarns over a low woven base for three-dimensional appeal.
  • Skilled artisans weave every Argan collection area rug by hand using traditional techniques. ARG-7 is a blended rug design made from a combination of natural jute and soft wool yarns.
  • Place in a dry and stable environment. Prevent prolonged contact with moisture by blotting spills with a dry white cloth. Vacuum using a suction-only setting as needed.

Title: Gurara - GUR-3 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Natural textures meet smart modern patterns with the chic Gurara GUR-3 area rug by Lemieux Et Cie. The innovative Gurara collection is inspired by the work of Romanian sculptor Constantin Brancusi, each piece emphasizing freeform geometries and natural materials throughout.

  • Lemieux Et Cie is the luxury decor brand of Christiane Lemieux, founded upon the idea that the process of creation is just as important as the product. Every piece is handmade in small batches by artisans across the world, each a master of their craft.
  • GUR-3 features sweeping chevron stripes overlaid at the center to produce dazzling diamond motifs, the lines in grey and the base rendered in variegated sandy tones. This contemporary rug would look equally at home in southwestern, mid-century, and minimalistic interiors.
  • Blended natural fibers give this handwoven area rug an especially engaging tactile dimension. Each one is flatwoven by hand, the edges tightly finished to prevent fraying in placements that experience regular foot traffic.
  • Professional cleaning is recommended. Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth. Rotate annually.

Title: Argan - ARG-3 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The handsome Argan ARG-3 area rug is a striking interior accent that highlights the appeal of natural materials and the beauty of artisanal construction. This exciting Lemieux Et Cie design captures attention with a bold central medallion, each detail rendered in raised yarns that pop with a rich topography.
